contemporary sitting room is differentiated to be repast area commonly , receive a visitor area and study area ( or rest area ) etc .现代客厅一般被划分为就餐区、会客区和学习区（或休息区）等。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, based on late Latin repascere, from re- (expressing intensive force) + pascere 'to feed'

means.word_mean: 1. the food served and eaten at one time
